This is color50.
================

Welcome to the home page of the documentation for **color50**, a lightweight
Python package for more colorful printing at the command line.

----------

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Documentation Contents

   Home <self>
   intro
   usage
   color50
   api

----------

*This project was created as a final project submission for Harvard University's
CS50P -- Introduction to Programming with Python course. Check out the course
here:* `CS50P course website`_.

.. _CS50P course website: https://cs50.harvard.edu/python/2022/
